column5: how is fishing just above the dunnville dam at this time of year?
Try it and let us know!!!
haha what the heck  i was at the lower damn last sunday  managed 1 eye about 3 lbs. thinking about fishing the upper part just above the dam for those moving fish
Still fishing the grand huh?  Must be geographical proximity..  Adapt and overcome...  Guess it ain't that shabby!  HD

Above the dam can be great if you know what you're doing. Takes a lot of practice on those waters to get them regularly, but once you know it, you'll always get them.  The ever so faithful white jig/pink head right above the dam is a good start.

Below the dam is way better this time of year ...1/4 and 1/2 oz jig heads with Yum and Power Bait Twisters tipped with a Large Shinner work very well all Fall...then once Ice up it gets even better ...i have a Tourney running Novemeber 1st on the Lower Grand 5th year now and allways lots of fish weighed in ....
